Room.Name: South Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the once-grand southern hallway of Castle Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: This was actually the feasting hall where the duke's men joined him around his table. Many were the parties that lasted till dawn in this room after a successful hunt in the forest of Kista. It was in this very hall that the Witch murdered the duke and his family. Now it is ashes.
